metadata.title: Friday, 26th February, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Finance how much money was spent on printing the Zambian currency from January, 2012 to October, 2015.
Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection
parts: (a)    what the total number of protected forests in Chadiza District is;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to degazette any of the protected forests and open up the land for farming activities; and
(c)    if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a)    what measures the Government is taking to improve the teaching of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) in public schools;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to procure computers and electrify schools in rural areas to enhance the teaching of ICT; and
(c)    if so, when the plans will be implemented. ORDER OF THE DAY 1.    The Civil Aviation Bill                                                                  (N.A.B 28/2015) Second Reading
